issue: Oil change took 3 hours instead of the promised 45 minutes
notes: Customer waited in lobby
Technician was handling another vehicle
Offered free detail as compensation

issue: Brake pads replaced two months ago are already squeaking on 2023 Toyota Camry
notes: Customer returned for re-inspection
Technician confirmed premature wear on front pads
Ordering replacement pads under service warranty

issue: Check engine light on 2024 Hyundai Tucson appeared 500 miles after purchase
notes: Diagnostic revealed loose gas cap triggering EVAP code
Cleared code and tightened cap
Customer advised on proper fueling procedure

issue: Windshield washer fluid reservoir cracked on new 2024 Ford Bronco Sport during first week
notes: Covered under new vehicle warranty
Replacement part installed same day
Customer satisfied with turnaround time

issue: Interested in the 2024 Kia EV6 GT-Line but wants to compare it with the Hyundai Ioniq 5
notes: Scheduled side-by-side test drives for both vehicles
Prepared comparison sheet on range, features, and pricing
Customer plans to visit Saturday afternoon

issue: Online price for 2024 Chevrolet Equinox RS does not match the price quoted in person
notes: Website showed $31,500 but in-store quote was $33,200
Web team confirmed promotional pricing had expired but page was not updated
Sales manager approved honoring the online price
IT team notified to fix pricing sync

issue: Customer wants to trade in 2019 Nissan Rogue and feels the appraisal value is too low
notes: Initial appraisal was $14,200
Customer provided KBB estimate of $16,500
Re-appraised at $15,400 after accounting for condition adjustments
Customer accepted revised offer with trade-in bonus promotion applied

issue: Reserved a 2024 Toyota Tacoma TRD Off-Road online but vehicle was sold to a walk-in customer
notes: Online reservation system did not flag the vehicle as held
Escalated to general manager
Searching partner dealerships for identical configuration
Located matching vehicle 60 miles away, arranging dealer transfer

issue: Monthly payment on 2024 Honda CR-V is $52 more than the amount discussed during financing
notes: Customer states agreed payment was $589 per month but statement shows $641
Reviewing signed finance contract and deal jacket
Discrepancy may be due to GAP insurance added at signing
Scheduled call with customer to review line items

issue: Wants to know if she can refinance her auto loan through AutoElite Motors for a lower rate
notes: Current rate is 6.9% APR on 2022 Subaru Outback
Ran soft credit pull showing improved score since original purchase
Offered refinance at 5.2% APR through partner lender
Customer accepted new terms, paperwork completed

issue: Financing application has been pending for over 10 days with no update on 2024 BMW X3
notes: Application was stuck at third-party lender verification stage
Contacted lender directly and identified missing employer verification
Customer resubmitted employment documents
Approval received within 48 hours of resubmission

issue: Questions about federal EV tax credit eligibility for the 2023 Kia EV6 GT-Line
notes: Confirmed 2023 Kia EV6 qualifies for up to $7,500 federal tax credit
Provided IRS guidelines document and income threshold information
Recommended customer consult with tax advisor for personal eligibility

issue: Ordered OEM roof rack crossbars for 2024 Toyota Highlander Hybrid three weeks ago, still not received
notes: Part number PT278-48210 confirmed on backorder from Toyota
Estimated arrival pushed from February 5 to February 18
Customer notified of updated timeline
Offered to source aftermarket alternative if customer prefers

issue: Needs replacement key fob for 2023 Jeep Wrangler Sahara 4xe after losing original
notes: Replacement fob ordered from Mopar, part number 68416782AB
Fob received and programmed within 5 business days
Customer picked up and confirmed both fobs work correctly

issue: Warranty claim for defective passenger seat heater element on 2023 BMW 330i xDrive
notes: Confirmed vehicle is within 3-year bumper-to-bumper warranty
Warranty claim submitted to BMW North America
Awaiting parts authorization and shipment

issue: Wants to know dealership hours for the upcoming Presidents Day weekend
notes: Informed customer: Saturday 9 AM - 6 PM, Sunday 11 AM - 5 PM, Monday (Presidents Day) special hours 10 AM - 6 PM
Customer plans to visit Sunday

issue: Out-of-state buyer asking about vehicle shipping options for 2024 Nissan Frontier PRO-4X
notes: Customer is located in Colorado, approximately 1,200 miles away
Obtained shipping quotes from two transport partners
Enclosed transport: $1,450, open transport: $950
Awaiting customer decision on shipping method

issue: Positive feedback about exceptional service experience during recent oil change visit
notes: Customer praised technician David Ramirez for thoroughness and communication
Feedback logged in employee recognition system
Thank you card sent to customer
Shared positive feedback in weekly team meeting

issue: Charging system on 2023 Jeep Wrangler 4xe not engaging at home Level 2 charger after recent service visit
notes: Customer reports vehicle was charging fine before last service appointment
Possible issue with charge port or onboard charger module
Scheduled diagnostic for February 5
Loaner vehicle provided in the meantime

issue: Inquiring about the trade-in process and documents needed to trade a 2017 Honda Pilot for a new SUV
notes: Sent trade-in checklist: title, registration, valid ID, loan payoff statement if applicable
Offered complimentary vehicle appraisal at customer's convenience
Customer indicated interest in 2024 Kia Telluride or Hyundai Palisade
